title: Domme by Default
description: Kinky never looked so normal.When a wife is faced with the question of what she is willing to do for love, her answer is…anything. She sets aside her own inhibitions to fulfill her husband's wildest fantasies.But at what cost to her peace of mind? What do you do when you’ve been appointed your husband’s Domme by Default? This story includes erotic M/F BDSM sex and related activities including anal play/sex/toys, a home improvement–challenged husband, a snarky, sarcastic wife, and the portrayal of a kinder, gentler side of BDSM. This book was previously published with another publisher.
author: Tymber Dalton
